name: Headbanger
description: Headbanger, a winner of the 2013 Amsterdam Cannabis Cup, is a sativa dominant hybrid cross between Sour Diesel and Biker Kush. This strain inherits a dense, conic bud structure from its Kush forefathers, as well as the sour aroma and head-focused effects of its Sour Diesel mother plant. Bred by Karma Genetics, Headbanger’s 10 to 12 week flowering period requires patience but promises high yields. Its uplifting and euphoric qualities make Headbanger a potent medicine for mood disorders, particularly depression.
descriptionPlain: Headbanger, a winner of the 2013 Amsterdam Cannabis Cup, is a sativa dominant hybrid cross between Sour Diesel and Biker Kush. This strain inherits a dense, conic bud structure from its Kush forefathers, as well as the sour aroma and head-focused effects of its Sour Diesel mother plant. Bred by Karma Genetics, Headbanger’s 10 to 12 week flowering period requires patience but promises high yields. Its uplifting and euphoric qualities make Headbanger a potent medicine for mood disorders, particularly depression.
aka: Head Banger, Headbanger Kush, Head Banger Kush

highlightedReviews.text: Complex flavor with dark smokey, "camp fire" qualities.  It was called a "creaper" where I'm from as the high crept upon you. I now assume this has high levels of CBD. A would sure as hell recommend it as I am completely fizzle ducked while writing this Review.

Rooty Tooty Fresh and Fruity! This strain is phenomenal. These days everything seems to be a hybrid and it's hard to get those pure expressions of sativa energy or indica relaxation, you kind of end up in a purgatory with some hybrids where you're too monged to do something but you don't feel completely relaxed either. But THIS to me is a perfect hybrid as I was talking my ass off but also feeling completely euphoric. I said to my girlfriend any more euphoric and I would think I'd taken some ecstasy. I agree completely with the Effects listed here on Leafly. Happy, Euphoric, Uplifted, Talkative but don't know why people rate Anxiety as high on this one as its a strain I could puff on continuously and just get happier despite how strong it is, and I'm someone who is prone to anxiety from some of the feistier sativa dominant strains. For the first few hours you are in the zone chatting away but later on it really mellows out and lulls you into a blissful slumber.
